    "attributes": [
        "id",
        "academic_year_id",
        "code",
        "first_name",
        "last_name",
        "birth_date",
        "age",
        "tax_code",
        "status",
        "school_origin",
        "how_know_us",

        "photo_consent",

            "Invoice",

}
